document.full_text: the high-profile insider trading trial of hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam enters its closing phase on wednesday and will turn on whether prosecutors or defense lawyers can summarize their case in a way that most resonates with jurors.
document.title: rajaratnam trial rivals to make last pitch to jury
lines_and_colors: the high-profile insider trading trial of hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam enters its closing phase on wednesday and will turn on whether prosecutors or defense lawyers can summarize their case in a way that most resonates with jurors.
